nodes.title: II.2. Superficial structures: Primarily funerary superstructure
Oral tradition
nodes.body: For the inmates of KhangmarKhang dmar monastery, the identity of Genmo Deumburrgan mo rde’u ’bur is a matter of speculation.

nodes.title: Funerary Structure FS2
nodes.body: Funerary structure FS2 (7 m x 7 m) is a much smaller funerary structure constructed on a fairly steep slope (35.551΄ / 13.428΄). The uphill flank of FS1 is elevated about 1 m above the slope while its downhill flank is elevated about 2.5 m above the adjoining terrain. It is possible that other small funerary structures are found in the vicinity but they have become too integrated in the naturally rolling terrain to positively identify using visual means.
